title: WKU News
cleaned_text: for News: All, Category: All Categories Sep 9th, 2023 As part of Parent and Family Weekend, the family of WKU junior Sydney Windhorst of Crestwood, Ky., was recognized as WKU's 2023 Family of the Year. [View Article](index.php?view=article&articleid=11494) Sep 8th, 2023 Bowling Green, KY - The Center for Gifted Studies at WKU announces 53 schools from 27 school districts in Kentucky and Tennessee participated in Project Launch Plus, a federal Javits grant, this past school year. [View Article](index.php?view=article&articleid=11495) Sep 8th, 2023 WKU Global will host the annual fall Global Learning Fair from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. Wednesday (September 13) at the Honors College & International Center. [View Article](index.php?view=article&articleid=11493) Sep 8th, 2023 The Kentucky Museum is hosting the Kentucky Arts Council's traveling exhibit "Continent to Commonwealth: Asian/Asian American Kentucky Art" from September 6 to 23. RAM is a nonprofit provider of pop-up clinics delivering free, quality dental, vision, and medical care to those in need.
